subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Aaron Rodgers kept Green Bay unbeaten with 335 yards passing and 3 touchdowns, holding off the plucky rookie Christian Ponder and the Minnesota Vikings, 33-27, on Sunday in Minneapolis.
snippet: Aaron Rodgers kept Green Bay unbeaten with 335 yards passing and 3 touchdowns, holding off the plucky rookie Christian Ponder and the Minnesota Vikings, 33-27, on Sunday in Minneapolis.
